item.title: By: Hang
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description: BTW, I haven't figured out how to shutdown the VM gracefully, I understand ACPI, etc are not supported so poweroff command doesn't stop the VM completely, I have to launch another terminal to kill the process.
item.content:encoded: BTW, I haven’t figured out how to shutdown the VM gracefully, I understand ACPI, etc are not supported so poweroff command doesn’t stop the VM completely, I have to launch another terminal to kill the process.
